[Message from Captain Vishotsky]:

Congratulations on achieving level 58!
I am Captain Vishotsky of Schuttgart Castle Town.
I've heard a lot about your activities. It is said that you are a very skilled and accomplished adventurer, which is why I'm sending you this message. It is time you knew about Kamaloka and its mutated monsters, Kaneuses. It fear has no hold on you, come to me immediately. I will await your arrival.
